page.title: 12Church Choir cont....
page.content: The choir has 4 basses,2 tenors,6 altos and 13 sopranos, I am one of them.The ladies wear black robes with white collars and cuffs and black uncomfortable hats,like jesters hats but without bells,every body hates them but the men wear black robes with white robes over the top,they don't have a hat. When we have services we bring our Shingay group choir folders to put our music in and we get dressed in the vestry.We walk to the choir stall at the beginning of the service.The smallest choir boy dresses just like the men but they have little frills on their neck.
